tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmacy_orders (
 order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 prescription TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE pharmacy_inventory (
 item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 item_name TEXT,
 quantity INT,
 price FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
   prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_id UUID,
   medication_name TEXT,
   quantity INT,
   date_issued DATE
)

CREATE TABLE inventory (
   medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   medication_name TEXT,
   quantity INT,
   expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
   patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_name TEXT,
   date_of_birth DATE,
   phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PrescriptionOrders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pharmacy_id UUID,
    patient_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    prescription_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientProfiles (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    dob DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);
CREATE TABLE prescription_orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, order_date TIMESTAMP, prescription_details TEXT);
CREATE TABLE inventory (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY, item_name TEXT, quantity INT, price DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE patient_profiles (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name TEXT, date_of_birth DATE, address TEXT);
CREATE TABLE pharmacies (pharmacy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, pharmacy_name TEXT, location TEXT);
CREATE TABLE prescriptions (prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY, order_id INT, patient_id INT, prescription_details TEXT);
